_meta.source: Researched from San Diego tourism, Port of San Diego, and cruise guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers downtown waterfront, Gaslamp, Balboa Park, and Coronado

transit_routes.name: Walk Downtown
transit_routes.note: Excellent walkable downtown! USS Midway adjacent to terminal. Gaslamp 10 minutes.

transit_routes.name: Coronado Ferry
transit_routes.note: Ferry departs Broadway Pier near cruise terminal. Scenic crossing to Coronado.

featured_experiences.name: USS Midway Museum
featured_experiences.note: Adjacent to cruise terminal - can't miss it! Excellent WWII/aviation museum.

featured_experiences.name: Gaslamp Quarter
featured_experiences.note: 16-block historic district. Great dining, shopping. Walking distance from ship.

featured_experiences.name: Balboa Park & Zoo
featured_experiences.note: World-famous zoo needs full day alone. Short Uber ride from port.
